frontmatter.title: Module 1: Intro to the Neotoma2 R Package
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn about the Neotoma2 R package and its data structure. In modules 2 and 3 you will learn the basic commands and you will begin your own journey  with Neotoma data on the following modules.

frontmatter.title: Module 2: Neotoma2 Core Commands
frontmatter.description: This module will show you the core commands of Neotoma2

frontmatter.title: Module 3: Synthesis With Neotoma2 - Helper Functions
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn about the most important helper functions.

frontmatter.title: Module 4: Synthesis With Neotoma2
frontmatter.description: This module will go through a simple age model workflow.

frontmatter.title: Module 5: Synthesis With Neotoma2
frontmatter.description: In this module we will do a more complex model using several sites.

frontmatter.title: References and Resources
frontmatter.description: Here are scripts to re-use and links to additional references and topics to learn.
